Class HttpCookieStore

    CookieStore

    public class HttpCookieStore
extends Object
implements CookieStore

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpCookieStore() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCookie(Destination destination, HttpCookie cookie)
      Adds the given cookie to this store for the given destination.
      void clear()
      Removes all the cookies from this store.
      List<HttpCookie> findCookies(Destination destination, String path)
      Returns the non-expired cookies that match the given destination and path, recursively matching parent paths (for the same domain) and parent domains (for the root path).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • findCookies

        public List<HttpCookie> findCookies(Destination destination,
                           String path)
        Description copied from interface: CookieStore
        Returns the non-expired cookies that match the given destination and path, recursively matching parent paths (for the same domain) and parent domains (for the root path).
        Specified by:
        findCookies in interface CookieStore
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination representing the domain
        path - the request path
        Returns:
        the list of matching cookies

      • addCookie

        public boolean addCookie(Destination destination,
                HttpCookie cookie)
        Description copied from interface: CookieStore
        Adds the given cookie to this store for the given destination. If the cookie's domain and the destination host do not match, the cookie is not added.
        Specified by:
        addCookie in interface CookieStore
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination the cookie should belong to
        cookie - the cookie to add
        Returns:
        whether the cookie has been added or not

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: CookieStore
        Removes all the cookies from this store.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface CookieStore
